title: S4 Ep21: Twitter changes how the media reports conflict
itunes:title: Twitter changes how the media reports conflict
description: Every day we can see harrowing mobile phone footage from conflict zones, shot by civilians, on the TV news. Ekaterina Zhuravskaya tells Tim Phillips that data from the Israel-Palestine conflict suggests social media has changed the tone of what traditional media reports.Â
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
